shows.title: Raffle! presented by Barbara Nice
shows.desc:
Phoenix Nights actress Janice Connolly as Barbara Nice will put a smile on your face and a spring in your step with this new show about chance and luck.. Playful and life-affirming, with a complimentary raffle ticket for Barbara's Table!

Running Time: 60 mins
Age: 12+

Janice Connolly BEM is artistic director and founder member of Birmingham-based Women and Theatre. She played Holy Mary in Phoenix Nights.

shows.title: Comedy Workshop
shows.desc:
Come and learn tips about performing your own comedy set! Share ideas about what makes us laugh and have a chance to get up and perform a short original comedy set of your own that you'll create during the session.

Janice Connolly BEM is artistic director and founder member of Birmingham-based Women and Theatre. She played Holy Mary in Phoenix Nights.
